title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.73 - Mobile refueling stations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.73 - Mobile refueling stations

State Regulations
(a) The mobile refueling station must be
equipped with hose not exceeding 25 feet in length, fitted with an approved
interlock nozzle which matches the fuel tank connection of the refueling
service vehicle and does not permit transfer of fuel from the mobile refueling
station into any vehicle other than the refueling service vehicle. (b) On mobile refueling stations a manual and
fusible shut-off valve shall be installed in the piping at the point where the
dispensing hose is attached to the system of piping after the pump
discharge. (c) Pumping rates for
mobile refueling stations shall not exceed five gpm measured at the
nozzle. (d) Mobile refueling
stations shall not exceed 1,800 gallons capacity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.73

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
